column3: I am the official charged with the bestowal of sanction upon our members. As you are not one of us, I am afraid you cannot avail yourself of these services.

I am the official charged with the bestowal of sanction status upon those of the rank of <hex:020947E802FF15>chief storm sergeant<hex:FF17>chief serpent sergeant<hex:FF15>chief flame sergeant<hex:03> or above. How might I serve you this day?
What would you like to do?
Heed me, O Sagacious Builder! Grant Thee Thy divine favor unto this Thy faithful servant!
It is done─the sanction of our organization is now bestowed upon you. I pray for your every success in the field.

In a bid to outfit our men and women in superior equipment, the foremost minds of <hex:020944E802FF0E>the Maelstrom<hex:FF1C>the Order of the Twin Adder<hex:FF14>the Immortal Flames<hex:03> and the Eorzean Alliance have come together to develop an advanced method of gear enhancement.
The result is “sanction,” a process which involves the casting of any one of a range of enhancing spells on gear specially crafted to harbor enchantments.

The <hex:020945E802FF0E>Maelstrom has<hex:FF1C>Order of the Twin Adder has<hex:FF15>Immortal Flames have<hex:03> recently devoted additional resources to the manufacturing of such arms and armor. Sanction-ready items are available to those of the rank of <hex:020947E802FF15>chief storm sergeant<hex:FF17>chief serpent sergeant<hex:FF15>chief flame sergeant<hex:03> or above in exchange for company seals.
